title: Quiz: Persona Prompting
description: Test your knowledge of using persona prompts to get multi-perspective feedback.

questions.question: What is the main benefit of using persona prompts when seeking feedback?
options: It makes prompts longer and more detailed
It provides perspective from different stakeholder viewpoints
It reduces the need for human input
questions.correctAnswer: It provides perspective from different stakeholder viewpoints
questions.explanation: Persona prompts help you see an issue from multiple angles (developer, PO, stakeholder perspectives), revealing concerns you might have missed.

questions.question: A good persona prompt should include the role, concerns, and typical priorities of that persona.
questions.explanation: Effective persona prompts define the role clearly, including what they care about and what drives their decisions.

questions.question: Which persona would be MOST concerned about technical debt and code quality?
questions.explanation: Developers work directly with the codebase and are most impacted by technical debt and code quality issues in their daily work.

questions.question: When building a prompt library for coaching, what should you prioritize?
options: Having as many prompts as possible
Complex, lengthy prompts for every situation
questions.explanation: A good prompt library focuses on quality over quantity, with well-crafted, reusable prompts for situations you encounter frequently.

questions.question: Persona prompts can help you prepare for difficult conversations by anticipating concerns.
questions.explanation: By simulating different personas, you can anticipate objections and concerns before having actual conversations with team members.
